## getSelectOptions() function

Get all options of a `<select>` as an array of strings. The selected option is suffixed with `(***)`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getSelectOptions(page: Page, select: ElementHandle<HTMLSelectElement>): Promise<string[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  page | Page | The puppeteer page handle. |
|  select | ElementHandle&lt;HTMLSelectElement&gt; | puppeteer handl eto the <code>&lt;select&gt;</code>. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string\[\]&gt;

e.g. `['Option A', 'Option B(***)', 'Option C']`
